38474.name: Opioid Pain Relievers (CDC WONDER (2017))
38474.description: Deaths per 100,000 people attributed to opioid pain relievers.
38474.datasetName: Opioid deaths due to overuse in the US - CDC WONDER (2017)

source.name: CDC WONDER (2017)
source.dataPublisherSource: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (2017)
source.additionalInfo: The total number of deaths as cited by the National Institute of Drug Abuse (2017) were divided by the US national population figures as cited on the US Census website and subsequently multiplied by 100,000.
